page.title: 13HOUSING NEW BURY
page.content: PEOPLE ARE BEING MOVED OUT OF HOUSES IN NEW BURY BECAUSE THEIR HOUSES ARE BEING MODERNISED.THEY ARE BEING MODERNISED BECAUSE THEY ARE VERY OLD AND DO NOT HAVE MANY MODERN FACILITIES. SOME HOUSES HAVE BEEN DECLARED UNFIT FOR HUMAN HABITATION, SOME HAVE BEEN DEMOLISHED AND OTHERS HAVE BEEN BOARDED UP AWAITING DEMOLITION. SOME HOUSES ARE BEING AFFECTED BY SUBSIDENCE FROM THE OLD MINES UNDERNEATH OUR DISTRICT.WHEN THE MINES GET VERY OLD AND CAVE IN THE HOUSES CRACK AND,SPLIT.THE TRAFFIC SHAKES THE FOUNDATIONS AND ALL THE WALLS OF THE HOUSES CRACK AND SPLIT AS WELL.
